page.title: 14TRADE AND FINANCE,PULBOROUGH
page.content: Pulborough has two main shopping areas in Lower St.& in Station Rd. There is a variety of shops but most are small and cater for specific needs.Larger items are bought in nearby towns eg. Chichester,Horsham & Worthing.There are 3 banks,3 building societies linked with estate agents,an insurance agency & a post office.Food shops include a cash & carry,fishmonger, off licence & confectioners.Other shops are 3 newsagents,a photographer,D.I.Y. a florist,funeral directors,electrical goods,household goods,2 dress shops,2 hairdressers,an auctioneers,a car repair centre.Many shops serve more than 1 function.Pulborough has a no.of professional offices with solicitors, architects,doctors,a nursing agency & a public relations firm.There are 3 garden centres & 4 garages/car sales.
